text: A Sunday in the Country () is a 1984 French drama movie directed by Bertrand Tavernier and starring Louis Ducreux, Michel Aumont, Sabine Azéma, Geneviève Mnich, Monique Chaumette, Claude Winter, Jean-Roger Milo. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Bertrand Tavernier
title: A Sunday in the Country
